title: A ryght fruitfull monicion concernynge the order of a good Christen mannes lyfe very profitable for all maner of estates, and other, to beholde and loke vppon / made by the famouse doctour Colet, sometyme deane of Paules.
author: Colet, John, 1467?-1519.
publicationDate: M.D.xxxiiii, the xxvii day of Marche [27 Mar. 1534]
publisher: Imprinted at London in Flete strete by John Byddell other wyse called Salysbury at the signe of our lady of pyte nexte Flet[e?] brydge,
